casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. Simpson WRIGHT
v.
STATE of Louisiana NO. 2017-KH-0673 Supreme Court of Louisiana. August 3, 2018 Denied. Relator has previously exhausted his right to state collateral review. See State ex rel. Wright v. State, 15-0532 (La. 1/15/16), 182 So.3d 957 . GUIDRY, J., recused.
